settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Currently, we offer shipping to the continental US and select countries in Europe. Please contact us at services@ativafit.com to confirm if we can ship to your location before placing your order.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 3-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers and local courier partners.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer:
We are unable to accept returns at this time.

If your product is malfunctioning, defective, or damaged in shipping, we will replace it according to our 1-Year Extended Guarantee below.

Replacement parts are available for purchase up request.

Read more about our 1-Year Extended Warranty.

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.answer: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us at services@ativafit.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
